name: Poko
description:
POKO Game

 Here we have the story of Poko, he recently lost his best friend Tama, they were really bonded together. Tama passed away a couple of weeks ago but she knows that his friend is too sad to know so she wants to deliver the last message so he can feel better.

In this game you will be transported into a dream where he will have a last adventure with his friend, they will face challenges and have fun while he learns that her friend will be always there with him.

Controllers:

Movement: W, A, S and D

Jump: Space bar

E: Throw cat (She works as a shield and platform)
